<img src="https://cdn.rawgit.com/LZIM/teampsd/hexagon_icons/np_graph_87995_003F72.svg" width="240" height="180">

* Group 1: Morale
* Group 2: Turnover
* Group 3: Providers Trained in EBPs
* Group 4: Students in Clinic 
* Group 5: Provider Availability to start EBPs
* Group 6: No Shows
